goodNeighbors.title: Good Neighbors
goodNeighbors.description:
My high school graduation film in Thelma Yellin High School of the Arts.
Meir just wants to watch the game but his ever helpless neighbor and her son constantly harass him for small favors. How long can he endure their pestering?

westernGate.title: Western Gate
westernGate.description:
Tension grows high as a high school student tries to take on a gate mechanism and its operator.
Short movie/clip that I made as a final project in 11th grade.

fourAngles.title: Four Angles Excersize
fourAngles.description: An incredibly weird short I've made during my second year in art school. I guess we had a task to film a short scene from four angles or something...

screeningTrailer.title: Screening Trailer
screeningTrailer.description: A trailer I've made to our high school cinema major's finals movies screening. Thelma Yellin High School of the arts 2010.

dontPirate.title: Stop Game Pirating
dontPirate.description: A PSA I've created for a citizenship class project. All of the data here is complitely made up and should not be taken seriously.

eyes_invite_drawing.description: A small drawing I did for a gallary that we've opened in my unit

movie_man_evolution.title: Movie Man Evolution
movie_man_evolution.description: A flyer I've made to hour first year cinema major screening

mador_logo.title: Department Logo
mador_logo.description: A logo I've made for my department in the army. I needed to combine a falcon, hand, globe and a spear

self_portrait_reaching_hand.title: Comic Style Self-portrait
self_portrait_reaching_hand.description: An expirement I did with rotoscoping and Photoshop effects
